articles.author: Hans von der Burchard
articles.title: Israel's actions are 'incompatible with international law,' says Germany's Habeck - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Habeck’s remarks represent a shift in rhetoric by senior German officials, who have been reluctant to make such direct accusations.
articles.content:
"The famine, the suffering of the Palestinian population, the attacks in the Gaza Strip are as we are now seeing in court incompatible with international law," Habeck said.
"In other words, it is in… [+372 chars]
